texts.0: My son has a chronic illness. The last medical bill was once again astronomical. How am I supposed to pay for this in the long run?
texts.1: I have now had to take out another loan. This scoring system is starting to worry me. I got a bunch of points deducted for all the debt. What will the others think of me? They're bound to think that I'm not behaving in an exemplary manner.
texts.2: I have now donated a kidney to boost my points account. Somehow I am not feeling so well right now. I feel dizzy and so weak. I should actually see a doctor, but I can't afford it at the moment.
texts.3: After I fainted at work, I had to have dialysis treatment. It was really expensive. Now I've lost my job and have even more debts. I won't be able to pay the next medical bill for my son.
texts.4: My son died yesterday and my wife and I lost our apartment privileges. I don't know what to do anymore.
